QuestData.Title: Not So Fast!
QuestData.Description: <The Khan of the Gelkis clan stares at you with an empty gaze as you detail the demon threat and Leh'prah's visions.>$b$bIt matters not to me what becomes of this land now. I have failed my clan and my forefathers....$b$bThere is but one thing left in this world that might bring my old soul hope, and she's likely dead as well.$b$bMy precious daughter, Kherrah, was taken from me by the Maraudine clan. If you can bring her back to me alive, I shall consider your proposal.
QuestData.LogDescription: Khan Shodo wants you to kill 10 Maraudine Maulers in the Valley of Spears.$b$bYou are to search their corpses for clues to Kherrah's whereabouts.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you discovered my daughter's whereabouts, $r?
QuestData.RewardText: As you slaughter their enemy, the Gelkis clan cannot help but to acknowledge your prowess.
